contents.alt: Minimap to find your way to the next step

contents.contents: Walk across the park to reach the Aligre Boulevard. Turn left. On the way, you can see the Abbey of the Cordelières on your right. Turn left into the “Rue des Prés” and behold the Rose Garden of Provins!
More than 300 kinds of roses grow in Rose Garden that is 3 hectares wide. Even if they look different from standard roses, this is actually the Rose of Provins.

contents.alt: Photo of the Rose of Provins

question.contents: What was this rose used for?

explanations.contents: This rose can be used to cure various illnesses.
